title: After August update anyone had issue that won’t accept your pin to get into your mobile?
content:
When I updated my device to the August 2019 security update my device restarted and when I entered my pin it won’t accept my pin so I switched it off and on again now it won’t turn on so,I did a fastboot method it opened fastboot mode and that’s it I can’t do anything if I select any of the options like start,recovery mode anything my device turns off.This is the fourth time I am having this issue I called for the support when it happened first time they said we’ll send a guy to pick up your device and we’ll look into it I said ok but the next day my device turns on and is working properly until another update came in and there goes it again .what should I do now ?
This image that has occurred yesterday, and it turned on when battery drained and again today in the morning it was not accepting my pin .This is a flagship device I don’t understand what’s wrong with it and now when I contact support I have a feeling that this will again work fine and I need to cancel my request.This is the 4th time I have this error .
Help me people what should I do?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
